name: Cosmic Felk is Dead! Long Live Cosmic Felk!
name_original: Cosmic Felk is Dead! Long Live Cosmic Felk!
description:
The year is 3062. From your job at a hip record store in Ataraxia, you are working to inspire today's youth into creating the 2nd wave of cosmic felk, a much maligned music genre. But no-one likes it for a reason.

CONTROLS: Just your mouse!

TOOLS: Made with Unity, Twine (Cradle), Photoshop and Reaper
